item.title: A little bit of Apache Iceberg
item.description: Iceberg is a high-performance format for huge analytic tables. Iceberg brings the reliability and simplicity of SQL tables to big data, while making it possible for compute engines like Spark, Trino, Flink, Presto, Hive and Impala to safely work with the same tables, at the same time.
